Total vacancies:586

Name of the Vacancies:

  • Revenue Inspector

Description

Latest Central Government Jobs for Bachelors Degree holders have been published by Odisha Sub-ordinate Staff Selection Commission for Revenue Inspector vacancies in Odisha. If you are searching for a government job in Odisha then it is an opportunity for you. You can fill the online application for the vacancies of Revenue Inspector, from 24-06-2021, and till 26-07-2021. If you are interested in all these vacancies in Odisha and if eligible, please check out the details given below, which have been given age limit, educational qualification pay scale, etc.

Application fee:

  • The mode of application is Online
  • The application fee for ST/ SC/ PWD category candidates is only Nil
  • The application fee for Others category candidates is only Rs.100/-

Educational qualification:

  • To apply for a Revenue Inspector in OSSSC, your Bachelor's Degree must be completed from a recognized University

Important dates:

  •  The starting date to apply in these posts is 24-06-2021
  •  The last date to apply in these posts is 26-07-2021

Age Limit Criteria:

  • For General Candidate, you should be between 21 to 37 years old. 

OSSSC Revenue Inspector Pay Scale:

  • According to the information given by the Central Government and as per the 7th pay commission, the teacher's monthly salary is as per norms

How to apply for OSSSC Revenue Inspector Recruitment 2021?

Press the Apply Now button above. You can directly and easily start the application process of the Revenue Inspector. Fill in your details and submit it or follow all the steps given below.

  •  First, go to the official website of OSSSC and register yourself on the portal.
  • Find the notification, log in and then provide the details and documents asked by OSSSC
  • Then save it and complete the application submission.
  • Then to fully complete the process you have to submit the application fee.
  • And finally, download the application form for future purposes.
